messages.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 5 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter.
messages.vornameValidation: Vorname should only contain letters and be between 2 and 50 characters
messages.nachnameValidation: Nachname should only contain letters and be between 2 and 50 characters
messages.emailValidation: Email should be a valid email address and not exceed 100 characters
